checks.label: Duplicate payment verification
checks.detail: No high-confidence duplicates after filtering 41 batch payments and 0 CSV overlaps. Previous false positives eliminated.

checks.label: Split payment analysis
checks.detail: 36 suspect instances (£12.1M, 2.3% of spend). Threshold: 5+ payments to same supplier in same week, 80%+ of approval limit.

checks.label: Year-end spike verification
checks.detail: Highest spike: 24.3x in Building Cleaning Contract (External). Year-end spikes are common in public sector (capital programmes, grants). Only extreme spikes (>3x) warrant concern.

checks.label: CH compliance — pre-breach only
checks.detail: 2 suppliers have current breaches, but all payments were made before breaches started. Not violations at time of payment.

checks.label: Benford's Law forensic screening
checks.detail: Significant deviation from Benford's Law (p < 0.001). χ²=5030.63 on 50715 amounts >£100. Largest deviation: digit 5 (4.9% off expected).

warnings: CRITICAL: Only 0.0% of transactions have descriptions. This severely limits analysis quality.

Benford's Law analysis shows significant deviation (χ²=5030.63). Digit 5 deviates 4.9% from expected. This warrants investigation but can also occur with legitimate round-number grants or threshold-based payments.
